```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tiss_labels = c("ADPSBQ", "ADPVSC")
```

pre-load
```{r}
r_names <- read.csv("../automated_cluster_analysis/data_out/key_table.csv") %>%
    filter(abrreviated %in% tiss_labels) %>% select(r_names) %>% unique() 
r_names <- unlist(r_names)
list_out <- list()
for (tiss_ind in seq_along(r_names)) {
    name <- r_names[tiss_ind]
    tab_1 <- read.csv(paste0("../MARCC output/variance_genes_kendall/kendall-",name,"-gene-clusters-high-variance.csv"))
    tab_2 <- read.csv(paste0("../automated_cluster_analysis/hpastainr_analysis/data_out/",name,"_hpastainr_results.csv"))
    tab_3 <- read.csv(paste0("../automated_cluster_analysis/panglaodb_analysis/data_out/all_tissue_out/",name,"_panglao_analysis.csv"))
    list_out[[name]] <- list(tab_1,tab_2,tab_3)
}

list_out
```
